snippet.title: Starsand - Official Debut Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Starsand is a survival game from Tunnel Vision Studio where players will embark on an open world adventure filled with exploration, hunting, crafting, building, and fighting off enemies in an arcane desert setting. Coming to Steam in Q4 2021.

#IGN #SummerofGaming
